name: 楊侑倫
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
1. 線性彈性力學 2. 變分法 3. 變分法應用到彈性力學 4. 結構力學 5. 扭力 6. 能量法 7. 彈性穩定 8. 材料選擇.
1.Linear Elasticity 2.Variational Method 3.Variational Principles of Elasticity 4. Structural Mechanics 5.Torsion 6.Energy Method 7.Elastic Stability 8.Materials Selection
schedule:
week 1  introduction and review
week 2  review of mechanics of materials
week 3  CHAPTER 1: THE STRESS TENSOR
week 4-6 CHAPTER 2: STRAIN
week 6-8 CHAPTER 3: STRESS - STRAIN RELATIONS
week 9 midterm exam
week 10-12 CHAPTER 4: LINEAR ELASTICITY
week 11-14 CHAPTER 5: APPLICATIONS OF LINEAR ELASTICITY
week 15-17 CHAPTER 6: ENERGY METHODS
scorePolicy:
Second week review test 10%
第三週材料力學複習考試 10%

Full english oral presentaion 30%
全英文課堂報告

homework 15%
回家作業

Midterm exam     15%
期中考
Final exam   20%
期末考
materials:
Cook, R.D. and Young, W.C., Advanced Mechanics of Materials, Prentice-Hall, Inc., 1999.

Continuum Mechanics Modeling of Material Behavior, Sadd, ISBN: 9780128114742, Elsevier
